TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract SignatureLineObject implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.InfoPath.SignatureLine

Docs.summary: Represents a Signature Line control in a view.

remarks.para: This type is a wrapper for a COM interface implemented by a coclass that is required by managed code for COM interoperability. To access the members specified by this interface, use the type that wraps the coclass that implements this interface. For information about that type, including usage, remarks, and examples, see

The class provides programmatic access to a Signature Line control in a view. To access an instance of the class associated with a Signature Line control, use the that is associated with the view that contains the control.

Only a subset of the properties of the Signature Line control are exposed through the class and its associated members of the object model. For example, the properties for specifying the size and tab index of the control can be set only by using the InfoPath designer. However, properties, such as the , , and properties, can be used to get or set the name, title, and e-mail address of the suggested signer for the control. Use the property to return a object associated with the control, which you can then use to access the digital signature associated with the control. The method can be used programmatically display the Sign dialog box to initiate signing.
